sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Lawmakers from Hungary's ruling Vides party have stalled a parliamentary vote on Sweden's bid to join NATO.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The EU's chief diplomat, Josep Borrell, is set to visit Ukraine today as a show of support for the war-weary country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak said he was shocked and sad to learn that King Charles III had cancer, but is relieved that the illness was caught early.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Hungary is the only country holding up Sweden's accession to NATO.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Members of the ruling Fidesz party boycotted a session of parliament called by the opposition to ratify Sweden's membership. After Turkey approved Stockholm succession in January, Hungary became the last of the military alliance's 31 members not to have done so. Orbán and the Vides party have stalled Sweden's bid since July 2022, alleging that Swedish politicians have told, quote, blatant lies about the condition of Hungary's democracy. However, last month, Orbán promised to urge ratification. The prime minister pledged to convene parliament, to urge parliament to act at its earliest opportunity. Today was an opportunity to do that. Monday's session in parliament was supported by six opposition parties, but Fidesz lawmakers did not attend, delaying the attempt to place a vote on the legislature's schedule. It's also very irrational what is he doing, despite all the pressure that's coming. He himself should understand that this is going to serve the interest and the security of the Hungarian society. But this is Orban, irrational, and his personal vanity is just there." The DEZ lawmakers want Swedish Prime Minister Ulf Kristersen to come to Budapest to negotiate on the matter with Orbán.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Kristersen has said he will make the trip, but only if Hungary votes to approve his country's NATO membership.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The EU's Foreign Representative Josep Borrell is due in Kiev in what's being seen as a gesture of reassurance to Ukraine of continued European support.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The visit comes on the heels of a recent EU deal to provide the war-weary country with a new 50 billion euro support package.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Borre was last in Ukraine's capital in October.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, President Zelenskyy has been meeting soldiers at a training center in the Dnipro region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: The trip comes as Ukraine's leader confirmed he was considering the possible dismissal of the country's top military officer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Asked whether he would be firing General Valery Zeluzhny, Zelensky said he was thinking about it as a part of a broader reset of the country's leadership. Ця війна є генералізмом. We are talking about the re-loading of some of the leaders of the state, not just one or another sector." The president has asked the Ukrainian parliament to extend martial law and general mobilization for another 90 days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Under the law, men aged between 18 and 60 are not allowed to leave the country as they may be called up for military service.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak said he is relieved King Charles' cancer was caught early.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Buckingham Palace says King Charles III has begun receiving treatment and is expected to remain in London for the time being. The king was diagnosed with the disease during recent treatment for an enlarged prostate. The palace has not revealed what type of cancer it is but says it is not connected with his prostate condition. Experts say the fact that the illness was detected early is important. During the examination of the pelvis other organs are looked at as well or there may have been some preoperative tests that were done but the main thing is it sounds as though he didn't have any symptoms from this cancer so it's been caught early. And all the messages that are coming out are very reassuring.

The law already received a fatal blow last November when the European Parliament voted down its own position on the text leaving it with virtually no chance of going ahead.
